data.question: What method was used to calculate the explosion rate and explosion-pressure parameters of the compound?
data.answer: DMOL3 module in MS (Materials Studio) software

data.question: What is the detonation velocity of [Pb(OH-Tz)2]n?
What is the response time of [Pb(OH-Tz)(NO3)]n to laser stimulation?
What is the laser-initiation threshold for [Pb(OH-Tz)2]n?
Does [Pb(OH-Tz)2]n have a positive oxygen balance?
data.answer: No, it has a negative oxygen balance of -16.97 %

data.question: Is the structure of [Pb(OH-Tz)(NO3)]n more compact than [Pb(OH-Tz)2]n?
data.answer: Yes, because nitrate has a smaller length than hydroxytetrazole molecules, making the structure more compact.

data.question: Can [Pb(OH-Tz)2]n be classified as an impact sensitive energetic material?
data.answer: Yes, both EMOFs are sensitive to mechanical stimulation and can be classified as impact sensitive energetic materials.

data.question: Does [Pb(OH-Tz)(NO3)]n have a higher detonation pressure than CL-20?
data.answer: Yes, the detonation pressure of [Pb(OH-Tz)2]n is 46.2 GPa, which is higher than that of CL-20.

data.question: Is the oxygen balance of [Pb(OH-Tz)(NO3)]n positive?
data.answer: Yes, the oxygen balance of [Pb(OH-Tz)(NO3)]n is positive due to the NO3− contained in its structure.

data.question: Does the presence of nitrate in [Pb(OH-Tz)(NO3)]n negatively impact its thermal stability?
data.answer: No, the nitrate in [Pb(OH-Tz)(NO3)]n does not have a great negative impact on the thermal stability of the compound.

data.question: Is the laser response of [Pb(OH-Tz)(NO3)]n faster than [Pb(OH-Tz)2]n?
data.answer: Yes, [Pb(OH-Tz)(NO3)]n responds more rapidly to the laser, which may be due to the NO3− contained in its structure.

data.question: Does [Pb(OH-Tz)2]n have a higher energy density than RDX and HMX?
data.answer: No, [Pb(OH-Tz)2]n has a detonation performance between HMX and CL-20, but not necessarily a higher energy density.

data.question: Can [Pb(OH-Tz)(NO3)]n be used as a high-energy additive component to improve the oxygen balance of a formula?
data.answer: Yes, the positive oxygen balance of [Pb(OH-Tz)(NO3)]n can serve as a high-energy additive component to improve the oxygen balance of the formula.

data.question: Is the initiation performance of [Pb(OH-Tz)(NO3)]n slightly better than [Pb(OH-Tz)2]n?
data.answer: Yes, the initiation performance of [Pb(OH-Tz)(NO3)]n is slightly better than [Pb(OH-Tz)2]n.
